name: Simple Shooter (Nikunj Saraf)
description:
Simple Shooter

This is a Third-person perspective game made by me from GameDev.tv C++ course.

This game has a standard set of controls for both keyboard and controllers.

Use WASD for the player to move, Space bar to jump, Mouse to rotate and LMB  to shoot.

You have to kill all the enemy AI to finish the game or else you'll lose.

Have fun!!
